required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Food Effect on the Pharmacokinetics of CM082 Tablet in Chinese Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study in Chinese Healthy Male and Female Volunteers to Investigate the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of CM082 Tablet.

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this study is to evaluate the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of CM082 tablet.

detailed_description.textblock: The main objective of this study is to evaluate the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of CM082 tablet in Chinese Healthy Volunteers. In addition, the safety of CM082 tablet in Chinese Healthy Volunteers who with High-fat meal or fasting state will also be evaluated.

primary_outcome.description: The effect of food on Cmax after high fat diet and fasting Blood sampling over a 72 hour period post dose in all dosing sessions

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of CM082
primary_outcome.description: The effect of food on AUC after high fat diet and fasting Blood sampling over a 72 hour period post dose in all dosing sessions
The effect of food on Tmax after high fat diet and fasting Blood sampling over a 72 hour period post dose in all dosing sessions
The effect of food on T1/2 after high fat diet and fasting Blood sampling over a 72 hour period post dose in all dosing sessions

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.03

arm_group.arm_group_label: Period 1: fasted control → Period 2: fed control
arm_group.description: Period 1: administration of CM082 200 mg at 7:30am, without the breakfast；Period 2: administration of CM082 200 mg at 7:30am, 30 minutes after the breakfast

arm_group.arm_group_label: Period 1: fed control → Period 2: fasted control
arm_group.description: Period 1: administration of CM082 200 mg at 7:30am, 30 minutes after the breakfast；Period 2: administration of CM082 200 mg at 7:30am, without the breakfast

intervention.description: The two groups of subjects were given an equal dose of CM082 tablet (200 mg) after a single cross-over fasting or high-fat high-calorie diet in two different test cycles to examine the effect of food on the pharmacokinetics of CM082.
intervention.arm_group_label: Period 1: fasted control → Period 2: fed control
Period 1: fed control → Period 2: fasted control

overall_official.affiliation: the Second Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University Medical College

facility.name: The 1st Phase Clinical Research Center of the Second Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University Medical College
